snippet: The Italian skier Matteo Marsaglia said he won the Birds of Prey super-G by taking risks on the challenging course, adding that luck helped him, too.
abstract: Italian skier Matteo Marsaglia wins the Birds of Prey super-G in Beaver Creek, Colo, his first World Cup victory.
lead_paragraph: The Italian skier Matteo Marsaglia said he won the Birds of Prey super-G by taking risks on the challenging course, adding that luck helped him, too.

headline.seo: Matteo Marsaglia Wins First World Cup Race
headline.main: Daring Run in Super-G Gives Italy 2nd Win
headline.print_headline: Daring Run In Super-G Gives Italy 2nd Win
